column2: Swim into the depths of the water.

There is no player using that name. 

 If you meant to find a character name, be sure there are no numbers in the name.<brx><brx>

There is no character by that name. 

If you meant to find a player name, be sure to include the four-digit code at the end.<brx>

Gain entry to the Havoc's Heir Airship.

• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

Contains 1 of each of these minis:
• Mini Toxic Warlock
• Mini Molten Berserker
• Mini Aetherblade Admiral

Each mini can be activated from your inventory to follow you around the world.
Combine these three minis in the Mystic Forge with the Mini Mai Trin from the Black Lion Chest to create a Mini Scarlet Briar.

Crab grabbin' can be dangerous. Protect those mitts!"
—Bram Dawnrazer"
<c=@flavor>For those who put others before themselves in this time of need.<c>
Utility Station: Double-click to set out a model of Gate Hub Plaza which allows players in the area to apply maintenance oil to their weapons. Station stays active for five minutes.
Too many spawns of this type nearby.
Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the huntsman recipe for Maintenance Oil Station.
Utility Station: Double-click to set out a model of the Towers of Lion's Arch, which allows players in the area to sharpen their weapons. Station stays active for five minutes.
Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the weaponsmith recipe for Sharpening Stone Station.
Utility Station: Double-click to set out a model of the Diverse Ledges, which allows players in the area to tune their weapons. Station stays active for five minutes.
Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the artificer recipe for Tuning Crystal Station.

<c=@flavor>Pieces of a sharp blade.<c>

Used in the crafting of Spinal Blade Pack back items.
<c=@flavor>A crate of 50 bags of supplies from Scarlet's Alliance troops.<c>
Ground-targeted skills will automatically cast at your mouse cursor's location.
Turn in for various goods at the Order camps in Gendarran Fields, Bloodtide Coast, or Lornar's Pass.
<c=@flavor>A barrel of 100 bags of supplies from Scarlet's Alliance troops.<c>
<c=@flavor>A box of 5 bags of supplies from Scarlet's Alliance troops.<c>
Automatically promote targets to lock targets when hitting them.
Prevents you from running through your target so that you stay in melee attack range.
Double-click to transform into a quaggan for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.
You cannot transform again right now.
The aroma of sea breezes and simpler times wafts from the bottle. Use its self-replenishing contents to transform into...something.
Sabotage weapon caches, slay dredge miners, and recover ore for research.
You assisted the Priory explorers in Dostoev Mine. Good job!
<c=@flavor>For those who only thought of themselves in this time of need.<c>

<c=@flavor>We faced Scarlet at our door, and that day we brought the fight to her.<c>

Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.
<c=@flavor>We faced Scarlet at our door, and that day we brought the fight to her.<c>
Can be combined in the Mystic Forge with Tempered Spinal Blades, Crystalline Dust, and Bottles of Elonian Wine to create a colored version of Tempered Spinal Blades.
Can be combined in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, Luminous Dust, and Steel Ingots to create a Twin Spinal Blades back item. NOTE: Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.
Can be combined in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, Incandescent Dust, and Mithril Ingots to create a Quad Spinal Blades back item. NOTE: Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.
Can be combined in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, Crystalline Dust, and Orichalcum Ingots to create an Advanced Spinal Blades back item. NOTE: Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.
Show player names as overhead text.
Show NPC names as overhead text.
Can be combined in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, a Vision Crystal, and the Gift of Blades to create a Tempered Spinal Blades back item. NOTE: Cannot be used in the Mystic Forge if transmuted.
A gift of blades used to create Tempered Spinal Blades.
Double-click to learn how to make a Gift of Blades used in crafting Tempered Spinal Blades.
<c=@flavor>Assortment of objects that might be important to a Lion's Arch refugee.<c>
Show enemy names as overhead text.
A reward bag for a good deed.
Combine all four Blueprint Scraps in the Mystic Forge to obtain the Spinal Blade Pack Blueprint.

Combine in the Mystic Forge with Blade Shards, Radiant Dust, and Iron Ingots to create a Spinal Blade Pack back item.

<c=@flavor>Backside reads: Caithe, someday you'll see. Tyria needs me. —Scarlet."<c>"
Contains a choice of 50 Bags of Alliance Supplies or 50 Empyreal Fragments.
Grants access to the Havoc's Heir airship. Double-click to travel to the airship.
Powerful Potion[s] of Slaying Scarlet's Armies

+10%% damage vs. Toxic Alliance, Watchwork, Aetherblade, and Molten Alliance
-10%% damage from Toxic Alliance, Watchwork, Aetherblade, and Molten Alliance
+15%% Experience from kills
